title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are applied immediately without any prompt or confirmation.
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view should remain filtered until the working set is removed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
